name: Fintan, son of NIALL Nioganach
sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: No personal reference is made by Nora Chadwick in the writing style adopted. She jumps right into the topic at hand without any introduction. In the tale of the Intoxication Of The Ulstermen, Fintan, who is the son of Niall Nioganach, is seen playing a minor role.
